description: A celebration of makers and creators

sessions.title: SAFETY THIRD: LIVE!
sessions.description: Safety Third but it's LIVE! The hosts (and some guests) share stories and rant while pretending to talk about science.

sessions.title: INNOVATING IN A NICHE
sessions.description: Some people chase trends, but these creators have built strong, loyal audiences by sticking to what they love and finding others who love it too. Hear how to turn niche ideas into standout content.

sessions.title: PROTOTYPING TO PRODUCT
sessions.description: Making one cool thing for a YouTube video is tough enough, but turning that idea into 10,000 units is a whole different challenge. Learn how these creators have taken their custom-built projects from prototype to product.

sessions.title: THE BACKYARD - AGAIN
sessions.description: We're back! Join as the cast of The Yard returns for more Backyard Science in the squeak-uel we've all been waiting for.

sessions.title: TEAM ROCKET
sessions.description: Join us to nerd out over thrust vectors, propellants, shock diamonds, and more rocket words! It's gonna rock(et).

sessions.title: IT'S ALL ABOUT CHEMISTRY
sessions.description: We all know Chemistry is the scientific study of matter, its properties, and how it changes during chemical reactions. This panel connects you with your favorite chemistry creators. Will they bond?

sessions.title: PLANES, TRAINS, AND AUTOMOBILES
sessions.description: Walking is overrated. This gang of creators prefers to drive, fly and float their way around.

sessions.title: STREAMING AMA
sessions.description: It doesn't get more live than this. Chat with top streaming creators in this Q&A panel.

sessions.title: UNCONVENTIONAL MATERIALS
sessions.description: Wood, metal, and plastic are fine...but why stop there? How to make something from anything.
